name: clawshield
description: ClawShield - Onchain verifiable skill security attestation for OpenClaw ecosystem

scripts.dev: npm run dev --workspace @clawshield/api & npm run dev --workspace @clawshield/web
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace @clawshield/shared-types && npm run build --workspace @clawshield/api && npm run build --workspace @clawshield/web
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace @clawshield/contracts && npm run test --workspace @clawshield/api
scripts.verify:ci: npm run test && npm run build && npm run lint --workspace @clawshield/web && npm run test:e2e --workspace @clawshield/web
scripts.verify:all: npm run verify:ci && npm run verify:flow --workspace @clawshield/api
scripts.video:v2:prepare: npm run prepare:v2 --workspace @clawshield/remotion && npm run sync:v2 --workspace @clawshield/remotion && npm run subtitles:v2 --workspace @clawshield/remotion
scripts.video:v2:render: npm run render:v2 --workspace @clawshield/remotion && npm run still:v2 --workspace @clawshield/remotion
scripts.video:v3:prepare: npm run prepare:v3 --workspace @clawshield/remotion && npm run sync:v3 --workspace @clawshield/remotion && npm run subtitles:v3 --workspace @clawshield/remotion
scripts.video:v3:render: npm run render:v3 --workspace @clawshield/remotion && npm run still:v3 --workspace @clawshield/remotion
scripts.video:v4:render: npm run render:v4 --workspace @clawshield/remotion && npm run still:v4 --workspace @clawshield/remotion
